installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Active scanner rules
installedAddons.changes:
Issue 1852: Fix reflected XSS false negative with poor quality HTML filtering.
Issue 1640: Fix reflected XSS false negative with double decoded output.
Issue 2290: Fix SQLi false negative with ODBC error message.
installedAddons.description: The release quality Active Scanner rules

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Invoke Applications

installedAddons.description: Invoke external applications passing context related information such as URLs and parameters

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Passive scanner rules
installedAddons.changes:
Fix a typo in the description of Referer Exposes Session ID.
Address false negative on jsessionid in URL Rewrite when preceded by a semi-colon and potentially followed by parameters (Issue 3008).
Address potential false positive in Cross Domain Script Inclusion Scanner by ensuring that only HTML responses are analyzed.
installedAddons.description: The release quality Passive Scanner rules

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: JxBrowser (Linux 64)

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Ajax Spider
installedAddons.changes:
Maintenance changes.
Add Export button to results table (Issue 4875).
installedAddons.description: Allows you to spider sites that make heavy use of JavaScript using Crawljax

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Replacer
installedAddons.changes:
Tweak help page.
Ignore CFU HTTP messages.
Allow to (explicitly) select Token Generator messages.
installedAddons.description: Easy way to replace strings in requests and responses.

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Quick Start
installedAddons.changes:
Enable the extensions for all DB types.
Use default user agent when creating seeds for the spider.
installedAddons.description: Provides a tab which allows you to quickly test a target application

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Script Console
installedAddons.changes:
Fix GUI freeze on script addition/removal through the API (Issue 4302).
Prompt for a charset when failed to read the script file (Issue 3383).
installedAddons.description: Supports all JSR 223 scripting languages

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Active scanner rules (beta)
installedAddons.changes:
Maintenance changes.
Issue 1142: Logic and alert risk ratings modified.
Correct timeout per attack strength in Heartbleed OpenSSL Vulnerability scanner.
Issue 174: Added further method checks to the Insecure HTTP Methods Scanner.
Skip "Source Code Disclosure - /WEB-INF folder" on Java 9+ (Issue 4038).
BackupFileDisclosure - Handle empty "backup" responses.
installedAddons.description: The beta quality Active Scanner rules

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Getting Started with ZAP Guide
installedAddons.changes: Added the Spanish, Filipino and Indonesian translations
installedAddons.description: A short Getting Started with ZAP Guide

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Context Alert Filters
installedAddons.changes: Fix an exception when running ZAP in daemon mode (Issue 4405).
installedAddons.description: Allows you to automate the changing of alert risk levels.

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Zest - Graphical Security Scripting Language
installedAddons.changes:
Fix exception when editing Action - Script with unsaved scripts.
Allow to select more HTTP methods in Zest Request dialogue.
installedAddons.description: A graphical security scripting language, ZAPs macro language on steroids

installedAddons.author: ZAP Dev Team
installedAddons.name: Passive scanner rules (beta)
installedAddons.changes:
Minor code changes to address deprecation.
At HIGH threshold only perform CSRF checks for in scope messages (Issue 1354).
Exclude JavaScript response types from the InformationDisclosureDebugErrors scanner unless threshold is Low (Issue 4210).
installedAddons.description: The beta quality Passive Scanner rules
